quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Inspire yourself to be great. Being good isn't good enough.
author: Gurbaksh Chahal

quote: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and got to work.
author: Stephen King

quote: If you need inspiration, don't do it.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Instead of being intimidated by the limitations, be inspired to find new ways around them.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: In life you need either inspiration or desperation.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy, and inspires your hopes.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.
author: Criss Jami

quote: People inspire you, or they drain you. Pick them wisely.
author: Les Brown

quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
author: Jack London

quote: Always keep your eyes open. Keep watching. Because whatever you see can inspire you.
author: Grace Coddington

quote: Inspire yourself to be great. Being good isn't good enough.
author: Gurbaksh Chahal
